publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2797 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Criminal Procedure (Amendment) (Scotland) Billâ€”That the Parliament agrees that Stage 1 of the Criminal Procedure (Amendment) (Scotland) Bill begins immediately and lasts for no more than 30 minutes; that (if the general principles of the Bill are agreed to at Stage 1) Stage 2 begins one hour thereafter and debate on any amendments lasts for no more than 15 minutes and Stage 3 begins immediately Stage 2 is concluded and ends by 5.00 pm. Supported by: Euan Robson*
